description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows mobile broadband driver denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-43537), it is essential to apply the corresponding quality updates for your specific Windows version:

1. Identify your operating system and version from the build numbers provided below.
2. Download and install the relevant KB update from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
3. Restart your system to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- For Windows 10 (22H2): Install KB5044273.
- For Windows 11 (21H2): Install KB5044280.
- For Windows 11 (22H2): Install KB5044285.
- For Windows 11 (23H2): Install KB5044284.
- For manual installation, you can find the updates here:
  - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
  - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is up-to-date and running a supported version of Windows as mentioned above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
